scripts.minify-obfuscate: terser js/App.js -o assets/js/App.min.js && javascript-obfuscator assets/js/App.min.js --output assets/js/App.obfuscated.js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:scss && npm run minify-obfuscate
scripts.watch:js: nodemon -w js -e js --ignore assets/ -x "npm run minify-obfuscate"
